name: One on One
description: Traditional singles wrestling match between two competitors

name: Tag Team
description: Team-based wrestling match with tag-in/tag-out mechanics

name: Free-for-All
description: Multi-person match where everyone fights at once

name: Abu Dhabi Rumble
description: Large-scale elimination match with timed entries

name: Promo
description: Non-wrestling segment for storyline development and character work

name: Handicap Match
description: A match with uneven teams, where one side has a numerical disadvantage

name: Faction Beatdown
description: A non-match segment where one or more wrestlers are attacked by a group

name: GM Office Confrontation
description: A backstage segment where the player confronts management

name: Performance Review
description: A segment where management evaluates the player's status and results
